protocol_name: Isolation of Matrix Metalloproteinases (MMP)-expressing cells from Stromal Vascular Fraction
protocol_name_html: Isolation of Matrix Metalloproteinases (MMP)-expressing cells from Stromal Vascular Fraction

materials.reagent_name: Adipose Tissue Progenitor Isolation Kit, mouse
Falcon® 5 mL Round Bottom Polystyrene Test Tube, with Cell Strainer Snap Cap

protocol_affiliation: Department of Medicine, Albert Einstein College of Medicine, Bronx, New York 10461,Department of Medicine and Molecular Pharmacology, Albert Einstein College of Medicine, Bronx, New York 10461

authors_list.name: Aoi Satoh
authors_list.affiliation: Department of Medicine, Albert Einstein College of Medicine, Bronx, New York 10461

authors_list.name: Kosaku Shinoda
authors_list.affiliation: Department of Medicine and Molecular Pharmacology, Albert Einstein College of Medicine, Bronx, New York 10461

status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

source_data.description: Prepare digestion buffer 10 ml / tissue / 2~5 mice.

components.data: Weight Collagenase D (f.c. 1.5 U/ml) and Dispase II (f.c. 2.4 U/ml) in 50 ml tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Weight Collagenase D (f.c. 1.5 U/ml) and Dispase II (f.c. 2.4 U/ml) in 50 ml tube.

source_data.thread_title: Comment on step 2 of Mouse Mmp3+ cell sorting from adipose SVF
source_data.protocol_name: Isolation of Matrix Metalloproteinases (MMP)-expressing cells from Stromal Vascular Fraction
source_data.protocol_name_html: Isolation of Matrix Metalloproteinases (MMP)-expressing cells from Stromal Vascular Fraction
source_data.annotation:
Collagenase D

7.5 U/tissue

Dispase II

12 U/tissue
source_data.thread_text:
Collagenase D

7.5 U/tissue

Dispase II

12 U/tissue
source_data.body:
Collagenase D

7.5 U/tissue

Dispase II

12 U/tissue

components.data: Add appropriate amount of PBS to dissolve.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add appropriate amount of PBS to dissolve.

source_data.thread_title: Comment on step 3 of Isolation of Matrix Metalloproteinases (MMP)-expressing cells from Stromal Vascular Fraction
source_data.protocol_name: Isolation of Matrix Metalloproteinases (MMP)-expressing cells from Stromal Vascular Fraction
source_data.protocol_name_html: Isolation of Matrix Metalloproteinases (MMP)-expressing cells from Stromal Vascular Fraction

source_data.description: Shake in water bath at 37 ℃.

components.data: Sacrifice mice and take out adipose tissue, place on sterile 10 cm dish with PBS at room temperature (RT).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Sacrifice mice and take out adipose tissue, place on sterile 10 cm dish with PBS at room temperature (RT).

components.data: Activate digestion buffer by adding CaCl2 (f.c. 10 mM).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Activate digestion buffer by adding CaCl2 (f.c. 10 mM).

components.data: Remove residual PBS from the tissues by patting on Kimwipe.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Remove residual PBS from the tissues by patting on Kimwipe.

components.data: Add 2 ml of activated digestion buffer to tissue in 10 cm dish.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 2 ml of activated digestion buffer to tissue in 10 cm dish.

components.data: Mince with scissors until approximately 1 mm pieace
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Mince with scissors until approximately 1 mm pieace

components.data: Transfer to 50 ml tube by pipette.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer to 50 ml tube by pipette.

components.data: Shake in water bath at 37 ℃ for 1 hour (gently shake by hand every 10 min).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Shake in water bath at 37 ℃ for 1 hour (gently shake by hand every 10 min).

components.data: Stop digestion by adding 5 ml of 0.5 % BSA in PBS + EDTA (autoMACS Rinsing Solution).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Stop digestion by adding 5 ml of 0.5 % BSA in PBS + EDTA (autoMACS Rinsing Solution).

components.data: Spin 300 g for 5 min at room temperature (RT).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spin 300 g for 5 min at room temperature (RT).
Remove the sup.

components.data: Suspend the pellet with 1 ml 0.5 % BSA in PBS + EDTA (autoMACS Rinsing Solution).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Suspend the pellet with 1 ml 0.5 % BSA in PBS + EDTA (autoMACS Rinsing Solution).

components.data: Place a cell strainer (100 μm diameter) over a new 50 ml tube and filter the cell suspension.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place a cell strainer (100 μm diameter) over a new 50 ml tube and filter the cell suspension.

components.data: Repeat step 13-16 with 40 μm diameter cell strainer.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Repeat step 13-16 with 40 μm diameter cell strainer.

components.data: Spin 300 g for 5 min at RT.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spin 300 g for 5 min at RT.
Discard the supernatant completely.

components.data: Suspend the pellet with cold (4 ℃) 80μl of 0.5 % BSA in PBS + EDTA (autoMACS Rinsing Solution). From this step use cold (4 ℃) buffer.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Suspend the pellet with cold (4 ℃) 80μl of 0.5 % BSA in PBS + EDTA (autoMACS Rinsing Solution). From this step use cold (4 ℃) buffer.

components.data: Add 20 μl (mix by gentle pipetting) of Non-Adipocyte Progenitor Depletion Cocktail, mouse.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 20 μl (mix by gentle pipetting) of Non-Adipocyte Progenitor Depletion Cocktail, mouse.

source_data.reagent_name: Adipose Tissue Progenitor Isolation Kit, mouse

components.data: Mix well and incubate for 15 min at 4 ℃ (protected from light).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Mix well and incubate for 15 min at 4 ℃ (protected from light).

components.data: During the incubation, place LS Column in the magnetic field of a MACS Separator and 15 ml tube under LS Column.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: During the incubation, place LS Column in the magnetic field of a MACS Separator and 15 ml tube under LS Column.

components.data: Prime column by adding 3 ml of 0.5 % BSA in PBS + EDTA (autoMACS Rinsing Solution).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Prime column by adding 3 ml of 0.5 % BSA in PBS + EDTA (autoMACS Rinsing Solution).

source_data.thread_title: Comment on step 32 of Mouse Mmp3+ cell sorting from adipose SVF
source_data.protocol_name: Isolation of Matrix Metalloproteinases (MMP)-expressing cells from Stromal Vascular Fraction
source_data.protocol_name_html: Isolation of Matrix Metalloproteinases (MMP)-expressing cells from Stromal Vascular Fraction
source_data.annotation:
Avoid air bubbles, bubbles could block the column.

Always wait until the column reservoir is empty before proceeding to the next step.
source_data.thread_text:
Avoid air bubbles, bubbles could block the column.

Always wait until the column reservoir is empty before proceeding to the next step.
source_data.body:
Avoid air bubbles, bubbles could block the column.

Always wait until the column reservoir is empty before proceeding to the next step.

components.data: After 15 min incubation, add 400 ul of 0.5 % BSA in PBS + EDTA (autoMACS Rinsing Solution) and apply onto the column. Collect flow-through containing Lin- cells.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: After 15 min incubation, add 400 ul of 0.5 % BSA in PBS + EDTA (autoMACS Rinsing Solution) and apply onto the column. Collect flow-through containing Lin- cells.

components.data: Wash column with 1 ml of 0.5 % BSA in PBS + EDTA (autoMACS Rinsing Solution) 2 times. Collect flow-through containing Lin- cells.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash column with 1 ml of 0.5 % BSA in PBS + EDTA (autoMACS Rinsing Solution) 2 times. Collect flow-through containing Lin- cells.

components.data: Spin 300 g for 5 min at RT.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spin 300 g for 5 min at RT.
Remove the supernatant.

components.data: Suspend cells in 100 ul of 1 % BSA in PBS + EDTA (autoMACS Rinsing Solution).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Suspend cells in 100 ul of 1 % BSA in PBS + EDTA (autoMACS Rinsing Solution).

components.data: Add 2 ul of TruStain fcX Ab. (0.5 mg/ml) and mix.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 2 ul of TruStain fcX Ab. (0.5 mg/ml) and mix.
Incubate 10 min on ice (Protect from light).

components.data: Add 900 ul of 1 % BSA in PBS + EDTA (autoMACS Rinsing Solution) and mix.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 900 ul of 1 % BSA in PBS + EDTA (autoMACS Rinsing Solution) and mix.
Spin 300 g for 5 min in 4 ℃.
Remove the supernatant.

components.data: Add 100 ul of Click-iT fixative (4 % paraformaldehyde in PBS) and mix.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 100 ul of Click-iT fixative (4 % paraformaldehyde in PBS) and mix.
Incubate 15 min RT (Protect from light).

components.data: Add 900 ul of 1 % BSA in PBS + EDTA (autoMACS Rinsing Solution) and mix.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 900 ul of 1 % BSA in PBS + EDTA (autoMACS Rinsing Solution) and mix.
Spin 300 g for 5 min RT.

source_data.thread_title: Comment on step 47 of Mouse Mmp3+ cell sorting from adipose SVF
source_data.protocol_name: Isolation of Matrix Metalloproteinases (MMP)-expressing cells from Stromal Vascular Fraction
source_data.protocol_name_html: Isolation of Matrix Metalloproteinases (MMP)-expressing cells from Stromal Vascular Fraction
source_data.annotation: Prepare permeabilization buffer (0.3 % Triton X-100 Dilute in 'RT (25℃)' 1 % BSA in PBS + EDTA)
source_data.thread_text: Prepare permeabilization buffer (0.3 % Triton X-100 Dilute in 'RT (25℃)' 1 % BSA in PBS + EDTA)
source_data.body: Prepare permeabilization buffer (0.3 % Triton X-100 Dilute in 'RT (25℃)' 1 % BSA in PBS + EDTA)

source_data.description: Remove the supernatant.

components.data: Add 100 ul of permeabilization buffer and mix.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 100 ul of permeabilization buffer and mix.
Incubate 15 min RT (Protected from light).
Add labeled Mmp3 Ab. (1:200) and mix.
Incubate 10 min on ice (Protected from light).

components.data: Add 900 ul of permeabilization buffer and mix.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 900 ul of permeabilization buffer and mix.
Spin 300 g for 5 min 4 ℃.
Remove the supernatant.

components.data: Suspend in 500 ul of permeabilization buffer and load on 5 ml Polystyrene Round-Bottom Tube with Cell-strainer Cap.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Suspend in 500 ul of permeabilization buffer and load on 5 ml Polystyrene Round-Bottom Tube with Cell-strainer Cap.

source_data.reagent_name: Falcon® 5 mL Round Bottom Polystyrene Test Tube, with Cell Strainer Snap Cap

components.data: Proceed to sort by BD FACSAria II.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Proceed to sort by BD FACSAria II.
